node.title: Intentional Health Evangelism
node.description: What does it mean when we state that “health is the right arm of the message”? Health evangelism should be fun, engaging, relevant, easy to learn, and effective. It should lead people to the foot of the cross. Discover resources, media (some of which will blow you away!), programs, and seminars you can draw from in your outreach efforts. Come and find out how to do this in your community. There will be a 60-minute presentation, followed by a 15-minute Q&A session.
